profile:
Whether you are looking for a glass shower door, glass railings, a glass table, or anything else requiring a custom glass solution for your home or office - Glass Ninja is the team for you. In the last decade, our family has perfected the glass manufacturing, cutting and installation process. Our products are of the highest quality at the most economical price point possible. From contractors to property development companies to home decoration institutes to regular homeowners, we love to work with Canadians from all walks of life. It would be an honour and pleasure to be able to work with you on your next home project. 

****
 
PRICE MATCH GUARANTEE: A new glass project can be a big investment – so make sure you get the best price on the market by taking advantage of our Price Match Guarantee. Simply show us a quote from a competing company and we will slash it. And if we can’t, we’ll tell you why.
 
WARRANTY ON ALL PRODUCTS: Get your glass project installed worry-free with our 2-year warranty on installations combined with the 3-year manufacturer’s warranty for all glass products. Full Disclosure: in our 20 years of installing glass solutions, we’ve only had a single customer claim this warranty. Our glass solutions are long-lasting.
 
We look forward to showing you the best custom glass solution for your unique needs. From glass shower doors to glass railings, to storefront glass - our expert team can do it all. And because of our direct-from-manufacturer connections, we are able to offer you the highest quality glass solutions at rates that most competitors cannot touch.  From regular glass doors down to glass that can literally go from transparent to opaque with the flick of a switch, we offer every high-quality glass solution that is on the market. If we do not carry it, then it’s probably not worth your time.
 
Give us a call or send us an email, and one of our friendly ninjas will get back to you at superhuman speeds. Have a beautiful day.

profile:
Welcome to Rosales W&D, the purpose of this site is to assist You with finding the perfect product to Affordably Personalize your home.  With over 10 years experience, we can say that we have mastered our craft.  Our products are showcased around the City in residential homes and private estates.  Every year, thousands of clients choose us for their projects mainly because of our professionalism, attention to detail and our one of a kind buying experience which ensures customer satisfaction every time!  And if you're here, it's because you have not yet found what you're looking for.  We believe it's not enough to simply meet your expectations-we must exceed them.

*****
 
We take great pride in our wide variety of Products & Services such as Window Glass Replacements, Glass Shower Enclosures & Partitions, Mirrors, Glass Railings,
Wrought Iron Inserts, Decorative Glass Inserts, Door Systems etc.

*****
Rosales W&D has been servicing Toronto and the surrounding areas for many years.

*****

Rosales W&D
Delivering Quality to Your Home
 
rosaleswd@gmail.com
(416) 456-0937 / (416) 220-1484

profile:
In 1977 we started a, defunct now, glass partnership called Global Glass and Mirrors Inc. 
In 2007 I started GTA Glass and Mirrors Ltd, specializing in glass shower enclosures.
Since 2007 we have supplied and installed well over 1,000 shower enclosures.
The emails below are testimony to the quality of our work.
GTA GLASS AND MIRRORS LTD
gtaglass@gmail.com
    TESTIMONIALS

Hi Nikolaos,
As usual, you did a perfect job. My wife couldn’t wait until I got home, she called me shortly after you finished to tell me how much she loved it.
Thank you
E…….

Hi Niko,
Don't worry about it. Never did I think you would make either of us look bad. You make us both look amazing.
Thank you for your tremendous service as usual 
Best Regards,
Y

Thank you – looks great
Regards,
D…….


Thank you Nikolaos
As I said enjoy your time abroad you have earned it. Thank you for your excellent work over the years. You will not be easily replaced.
C...﻿

Hi Nikolaos 
I must tell you that it has been a pleasure to deal with you for the short time we have
I wish I had met you years ago 
I wish you all the best in the future 
Many Thanks 
K.. S........

﻿Hi Nikolaos,
S..... asked me to ask you to put him in your line up as he has a job that he is doing now and he needs your services.... he needs a shower door... before June :)... in a few weeks if possible!
Congrats again, S..... and I have great respect for you.
J....

﻿Good Morning - I had a shower this morning and for the first time in forever, did not have a flood on the floor.  That in itself is worth this thank you.  But what I really wanted to thank you for was taking your time to help with such a small job.  That was a real kindness and left me smiling and feeling good about people who still make the world a better place by being kind.
K.... told me you were a really nice man and she was right!
Thank you so much and hope today is a good one for you.
I.... M.....
19 T.... G...

﻿Nikolaos,
Trusting that this e-mail finds you in good health and spirit. My apologies for not sending this short note earlier.
My family and I have had several weeks now to enjoy the shower that you were kind enough to install for us. We are extremely pleased with the job and the professionalism of your work.
Considering the long distance and long work days that you endured to complete this job you have my sincere appreciation and respect.
I hope that when you really do retire it will be filled with relaxation and joy as you no doubt certainly deserve that.
By the way we really enjoyed the wine from Greece that you were kind enough to share with my wife and I and look forward to visiting your home country in the years ahead.
Ill keep my eyes open for a life experienced gentleman sitting at a café drinking expresso if its early in the day or wine if its a little later on lol. 
Thanks again
G.... and A...

Please know that we appreciate it very much, and that you have very favourably affected our showering experience. 
My wife and I thank you.  Take care...J...

profile:
Customers come to Glass Mechanics Inc because we provide 24/7 emergency service, a 1-hour response time, and an outstanding customer experience. We repair and install glass for residential and commercial clients in the GTA and surrounding areas from our home base of Mississauga.
***
With over 25 years of industry experience, we work to ensure that your product meets your exact project specifications with our 100% customer satisfaction guarantee.
***
We work along with developers, architects, and contractors to meet project expectations and deadlines. For expertly installed glass for your entrance systems, curtain walls, skylights, and more, Glass Mechanics Inc is here for you. We also provide residential glass services such as installing and repairing glass shower enclosures, glass railings, as well as replacing glass for patio doors and thermal panes.
Whether it’s emergency repairs or custom fabrication and installation, let our expert staff members provide you with quality work at competitive prices. Contact Glass Mechanics Inc today for your no-obligation consultation!
